# Bloatbomb (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Acid Spells|acid]], [[Death Spells|death]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Antipaladin Spells|Antipaladin 4]], [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 8]], [[BoXM 8th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 8]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Living creature touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous and 1 minute/level (see text)

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates or Reflex half (see text)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 175

The target creature dies if it fails a Fortitude saving throw and its Hit Dice are no more than half your caster level. If it dies, its corpse rapidly putrefies. The next creature to touch the corpse within 1 minute per level of the targetâ€™s death causes the corpse to explode in a 10-foot-radius burst, dealing 3d6 points of acid damage (Reflex half).
